Budget Car & Van Rental UAE is launching a loyalty program as the franchise of Budget Rent - A - Car International expands its presence in the United Arab Emirates .
Budget Car & Van Rental UAE is launching a loyalty program as the franchise of Budget Rent - A - Car International expands its presence in the United Arab Emirates .
Members earn points redeemable for car rental charges within the UAE , including vehicle upgrades , GPS rental , baby seat rental , collision damage waiver and personal accident insurance .

All customers of Budget UAE are eligible for the Gateway loyalty card and applications are available from any Budget location in the UAE , and customers can also join online through the Budget website .
